channel.title: I get this error on my server
channel.description:
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 25 at java.lang.String.getChars(String.java:850) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(BufferedWriter.java:208) at client.savemoreinfo(client.java:28234) at client.process(client.java:14742) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47)[/code]
Why does that happen?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 26, 2007, 09:10:16 PM[/size][hr]Come on this is important, please post something. Everytime it happens, which only takes 1 minute, it dc's and everyone gets the message "You're account is already online."

item.title: I get this error on my server
item.dc:creator: @Evangelion Evangelion
item.description:
@Evangelion wrote:

That error has never happened to me, maybe the last thing you edited you messed up on?

Read full topic
